page.title: 20Attitudes-Witton &Ridlington
page.content:
Approach to life is cheerful & philosophical.Winters & long cold springs can undermine people's energy. In summer families with young children appreciate the sandy beaches. {Flooding}People near the sea are aware that high tides combined with strong winds may break down the sea defences & cause flooding. {Decline in Village Life}There is a feeling that decline in village life is due to:-(a)Retired people buying up property so that youngsters cannot compete financially & live elsewhere. (b)Lack of transport. (c)Lack of amenities leading to the decline in community spirit.But there are people with neighbourly attitudes.
This survey has been written & put together by the Witton & Ridlington Womens Institute & computed by A.Batey
